name: spooty
description: Spooty is a self-hosted request and metadata dashboard for Spotify-linked media libraries, helping manage playlists and discover tracks for local collections.

features.title: Spotify Integration
features.description: Connects to Spotify for playlist and track data

features.title: Request System
features.description: Allows users to request songs for local music library

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Syncs Spotify playlists to local collection

features.title: Track Metadata
features.description: Fetches detailed information about requested tracks

features.title: Download Coordination
features.description: Coordinates with download tools for music acquisition

features.title: Duplicate Detection
features.description: Avoids requesting songs already in library

features.title: User Management
features.description: Handles multiple users with individual request histories

features.title: Request Queue
features.description: Manages pending requests with priority ordering
